product_overview: A web application tailored for Indian students to practice and undertake aptitude tests for placement preparation, delivering a real exam-like experience enriched with AI-powered analytics and comprehensive performance insights.
core_goals: Provide a seamless, responsive platform for aptitude test practice and mock tests.
Deliver an authentic exam simulation experience with full test interface including timer, question navigation, and auto-save.
Implement AI-driven analytics and personalized recommendations for user improvement.
Offer secure user authentication with multi-method login and profile management.
Optimize the platform for SEO, accessibility, and mobile performance.
Ensure robust admin management of content like categories, questions, and tests.
Enable detailed test results review with performance breakdown, solution review, and comparative metrics.
Incorporate an engaging dashboard for tracking progress, trends, and weak area identification.
key_features: Homepage with hero section, CTAs, feature highlights, statistics counter, testimonials placeholder, and footer with navigation links.
Full authentication system supporting email/password login, Google OAuth, password reset, session management, and password strength indicator.
Practice Mode with topic selection, configurable practice sessions (number of questions, difficulty, time limit), real-time feedback, and detailed practice summary.

Test Mode with multiple test types (mixed, PYQs, custom-coming soon), configurable tests, instruction screen with system checks, interactive test interface with question palette and progress tracking, and test submission confirmation flow.
Comprehensive Test Results & Analytics with overview, detailed analysis with charts, AI insights, solutions review, and downloadable PDF reports.
Student Dashboard with quick stats, recent activity, performance trends charts, AI-powered recommendations, and navigation.
User Profile Management page with editable fields, settings including dark mode toggle, and account management.
Admin Panel to CRUD categories, tests, and questions with management interface and controls.
Global and segmented Leaderboards displaying ranks, badges, and progress.
Adaptive Practice System powered by AI to personalize question difficulty and track mastery.
SEO & Performance features including Metadata API usage, structured data (JSON-LD), sitemap and robots.txt generation, canonical URLs, lazy loading, and accessibility compliance.
Progressive Web App features with offline support and install prompt.
Comprehensive UI component library for consistent design and interaction.
user_flow_summary: User signs up or logs in via email/password or Google OAuth, redirected to dashboard.
From dashboard or homepage, user selects a practice topic, configures session (questions, difficulty, timer), and starts practicing with immediate feedback.
User navigates practice questions, submits answers, and views practice summary with detailed stats and option to review mistakes.
User selects test type (All Questions, PYQs, Custom), configures test settings, reviews instructions with mandatory checks, and starts the timed test in a full-screen interface.
During test, user navigates questions, marks for review, saves answers; test auto-saves progress and has a countdown timer with warnings at 5 minutes left.
User submits test after confirmation, then views detailed results dashboard showing scores, charts, AI insights, and solutions with filters and PDF download option.
User accesses dashboard for overall stats, recent activities, performance charts, and personalized recommendations.
User manages profile settings including preferences like dark mode, and can logout or delete account.
Admins use the admin panel to manage tests, questions, categories with CRUD operations and monitoring tools.
validation_criteria: User authentication works with email/password and Google OAuth including password reset flow.
Practice mode displays topics correctly, allows configuration, and provides real-time feedback and accurate scoring.
Test mode provides all test configurations, instructions, full test interface, auto-save, and smooth navigation.
Test submission accurately saves results and redirects to results page with comprehensive analytics.
Dashboard displays correct recent activity, statistics cards, performance trends, and recommendations.
Profile page updates and dark mode toggle function correctly and persist user preferences.
Admin panel supports full management of categories, tests, questions with CRUD functionality.
Pages have SEO optimized metadata, structured data, and accessibility standards met.
Application achieves responsive design on mobile and tablet with performant and accessible UI.
API routes are secured with authentication and handle error states gracefully.
